stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int[] arr1 = {2, 4, 6, 8, 10};
int num = 0;
for (int val : arr1)
{
   num += 10;
}

choicesHtml: The loop adds 10 to each element in  arr1.
The loop adds 10 to  num  once for each element in  arr1.
The loop adds the value of each element in  arr1  to num.
The loop does not change the value of  num  because it uses an enhanced  for  loop.
